name: Sunflower Seeds
description: Grow your own beautiful, bright sunflowers with these high-quality seeds. Perfect for adding a splash of color to your garden.

name: Basil Plant
description: A fragrant and fresh basil plant. Ideal for kitchen gardens and adding a delicious touch to your culinary creations.

name: Succulent Assortment
description: A lovely assortment of easy-to-care-for succulents. They thrive indoors and require minimal watering.

name: Gardening Trowel
description: An ergonomic and durable gardening trowel, essential for planting and weeding in your garden.

name: Tomato Seeds
description: Grow juicy and flavorful tomatoes right in your backyard. These seeds are perfect for both beginners and experienced gardeners.

name: Rose Bush
description: A classic red rose bush that will bring elegance and a beautiful fragrance to any garden space.
